body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install qt@5.14.2+webkit

```

### Information on your system

~$ spack debug report
* **Spack:** 0.14.2-1505-037aa66
* **Python:** 2.7.5
* **Platform:** linux-centos7-broadwell

Got the same failure on linux-ubuntu20.04-broadwell/gcc-9.3.0.


### Additional information

[spack-build-env.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/4836354/spack-build-env.txt)


[spack-build-out-01.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/4836368/spack-build-out-01.txt)
[spack-build-out-02.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/4836372/spack-build-out-02.txt)
[spack-build-out-03.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/4836376/spack-build-out-03.txt)

@sethrj
@michaelkuhn @davydden  @Sinan81 (as you are mentioned as qt experts in https://github.com/spack/spack/issues/13555 :)

### General information
- [x] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [x] I have run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and @mentioned any maintainers
- [x] I have uploaded the build log and environment files
- [x] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
title: Installation issue: qt+webkit
